work.name: Tencent Inc.
work.summary: Leading the research and development of intelligent game agents using RL-based approaches for various types of games.
highlights: Led the team to develop the first commercial game agent based on reinforcement learning, deployed in QQ Speed Mobile.
Led the team to create the first commercial game agent based on self-play reinforcement learning, applied in Naruto Mobile.
Led the team to build a system for rapid production of multi-agent cooperative and adversarial agents, deployed in the MOBA game League of Legends: Wild Rift.
Led the team to develop an agent production system capable of adapting to 3D environments and supporting various skills such as driving, collecting, and combat, applied in several FPS games.

work.name: Tencent Inc.
work.position: Head of Large Language Model Team
work.summary: Leading the research and development of large language model-based agents for interactive environments.

education.summary: I was a member of LAMDA Group, led by professor Zhi-Hua Zhou. In this group, I was focused on studying artificial intelligence and machine learning, supervised by professor Zhi-Hua Zhou and professor Yang Yu. I received my M.Sc. degree in Computer Science and Technology in July 2017.
highlights: Outstanding Graduate of Nanjing University. Nanjing, June, 2017
Outstanding Master's Thesis in Computer Science and Technology. Nanjing, June, 2017
Teaching Assistant of the Artificial Intelligence. (for undergraduate students. Spring, 2015)
First Prize in 1st National Big Data Competition for College Students Chengdu, April, 2015

education.summary: I was selected for the Elite Project of Nanjing University in September 2010 and enrolled in the Kuang Yaming Honors School to study Computer Science. I received my B.Sc. degree in Computer Science in June 2014. In the same year, I was admitted to study for a M.Sc. degree in Nanjing University without entrance examination.
highlights: Excellent Project Completion in the National Undergraduate Innovation Program. Nanjing, June, 2013
Third Prize in Microsoft's Kinect for Windows Application Design Competition. Nanjing, June, 2013
Third Prize in SAP Mobile Application Design Competition. Nanjing, May, 2012

publications.name: Core Algorithms of Reinforcement Learning and Its Applications
publications.summary: Main author. A comprehensive book on reinforcement learning algorithms and their practical applications.

publications.name: Tencent Game Development Essentials II
publications.summary: Co-author. A guide covering essential techniques and methodologies in game development.
